{{notability|date=July 2011}} {{primarysources|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox_Broadcast | call_letters = DXVC-TV (PTV-7 Zamboanga)| station_logo = <!-- Do NOT place a non-free image here without complying with WP:NFCC #10c -->| station_slogan = People's Television| station_branding = ''PTV-7 Zamboanga''| analog = 7 ([[VHF]])| digital = | affiliations = [[People's Television Network]]| founded = [[1961]]| location = [[Zamboanga City]]| owner = [[People's Television Network|People's Television Network, Inc.]]| callsign_meaning = DXVC| former_affiliations = [[GMA Network]] (1961-1974)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 5 kilowatts| homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv/ People's Television Network]| }} '''DXVC-TV''', channel 7, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]]. Its studio and transmitter facility is located in [[Tetuan, Zamboanga City]].
==See also== *[[People's Television Network]]
